title: Jeju Island Geopark - A Volcanic Wonder of Korea (gnv64)
description:
Jeju Island Geopark - A Volcanic Wonder of Korea (Geoheritage, Geoparks and Geotourism) 
by Kyung Sik Woo, Young Kwan Sohn, Seok Hoon Yoon and Ung San Ahn
Springer | July 2013 | ISBN-10: 3642205631 | PDF | 110 pages | 16.2 mb <a href="
http://www.amazon.com/Jeju-Island-Geopark-Geoheritage-Geotourism/dp/3642205631" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.amazon.com/Jeju-Island-Geopark-Geoheritage-Geotourism/dp/3642205631</a>

This book will deal with geological as well as cultural, historical, archaeological and biological aspects in Jeju Global Geopark. It will start with introduction of Jeju Global Geopark, geographic setting, habitats, history, economy and tourism, management, general geology and geosites, future geosites, other significant heritage sites, economically sustainable tourism, education and promotion and management plan.

CONTENTS
1 Introduction 1
2 Geographic Setting 3
3 Habitats 7
4 History 9
5 Geology of Jeju Island 13
6 Geosites 15
7 Future Geosites 51
8 Geotourism 61
9 Economy and Development of Sustainable Tourism 69
10 Management Plan 75
References 87
